title: Blackout: best kept secret: a profile of Archie Roach singer/songwriter
creator_credit: Llew Cleaver, Richard Reisz and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: ‘Best kept secret: a profile of Archie Roach singer/songwriter is part of ABC’s ‘Blackout’ series and provides an intimate account of one of one of Australia’s most popular contemporary indigenous performers. The video examines how Archie’s stolen childhood has affected his life and his music.
